credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Angels Carrying the Holy Cross and Shroud.
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
description: Center: Sketches of two winged angels flying and each carrying a large shroud in their hands.  Bottom right: Sketches of two winged angels flying and carrying large crosses across their chest.  At top left outline sketches of figures.
name: Drawing
